short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create Specification Sheets and Catalog Items from any manufacturer's website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Specsources SpecGrab 
Your ultimate solution for effortlessly gathering Spec information from any manufacturer's website.  Craft bespoke Spec Sheets for your projects. 

Say goodbye to countless hours spent on manual specification writing. 

With SpecGrab: 
- Streamline your workflow and save invaluable time. 
- Seamlessly import images, PDFs, and labels to enrich your specifications.
- Elevate your project management to new heights.

Your indispensable companion for precision and efficiency.
